id: Books/Book Reviews/Four Thousand Weeks Time Management for Mortals
title: Four Thousand Weeks Time Management for Mortals
description: This book takes all the productivity and self-help books and asks if we should take a step back and not be captives of our ambitions. This book is for those who try too hard to be 10X'ers and feel demotivated by their lack of results.
